And if some small part of the bones is cracked and shattered, then take that facilitating material which you should use for the splints; and then cure the wound with lint and ointments which we have said.
E l’autra manieyra de operacio es leugiera, longinqua de paor, la qual diyssec Gualia e la lauzec per gran lausor; e aquest es le sermo de lu: necessari es a tu en le comensament que comenses descobrir la partida del os del loc en le qual es la fractura pus vehement e pus manifesta, entro que quan auras descubert aquela partida e auras pausat dejos lu la extremitat de aquest inscissori lent e alegre del qual aquesta es la forma:	And the other method of operation is lighter, far from fear, which dissects Gualia and cuts it with great caution; this is its saying: at the beginning you must necessarily start uncovering the part of the bone in the area where the fracture is most severe and most evident. When you have uncovered that part and placed your hand on the extremity of this slow and cheerful scalpel, which has this form:
E es que la partida lenticular es leon e no inscideys alcuna causa, e la partida aguda es de lu en dos latz avantz en longitut, ayssi cum vezes; que la partida lenticular sia ajustada al ciphac am la facia de lu inscident aguda en le os.	And it is that the lenticular part is flat and you should not incise for any reason, and the acute part is divided into two cuts lengthwise, as you see; so that the lenticular part is fitted to the keyhole at the face of the incising acute part on the bone.
E aprop percuteys sobre le inscissori de una partida am un petit malhet entro que inscidas tot le os am facilitat ayssi cum es revolvut, e tu sias segur del pannicol que no accida en lu accident que temas en denguna manieyra, e si le medicant14 era le pus fol de totz les homes e le mays ignorant de lor; certament, e si era dorment.	And then strike on the incising part with a small hammer as you incise the entire bone with ease, and you be certain of the panniculus that it does not occur in the accident you fear in any way, and if the surgeon was the most foolish of all men and the most ignorant of them; certainly, if he were sleeping.
Lahoras si romania alcuna causa annexa al os del pannicol en alcus locs de os, inscidira aquel de lu am la extremitat del inscissori aquel lenticular, e deliuraria aquel de lu am facilitat, quar es deliurat de lu ses nocument e ses paor.	When any fracture occurs in the region of the foot at certain bone locations, it will incise that part at the extremity of the cut bone, and will deliver that part with ease, for it is relieved of its harm and fear.
E si fractura del os no penetra entro al pannicol, e aquo que es abscidit o es ostat del os es la facia de lu, e roman en lu asperitat e satagias subtils, lahoras cove que razas aquela asperitat e erradiques aquelas satagias am razoris subtils per les quals tu has preparat le nombre, de diversas quantitatz per que sia a tu possible administrar de aquels en tot loc les pus convenientz de lor e le pus dreyt de aquels segon aquo en que te perduzeys la tua operacio aquel os trencat e la figura de lu.	And if the fracture of the bone does not penetrate into the foot, and what is severed or remains from the bone is its surface, and it stays there rough and fine particles underneath, then you must rasp that roughness away and eradicate those fine particles with fine razors, which you have prepared in various quantities so that you can administer them most conveniently in all places and according to the right place for your operation on that broken bone and its figure.
E cove que administres en la tua razio am la qual razes le os al comensament le pus lat de aquels razoris, e aprop usa aprop lu del pus subtil de lu, e no cesses far aquo segon continuitat entro que pervenguas ad aministrar le pus teon e·l pus subtil de totz aquels.	And you must administer according to your judgment, using the edge of the razor to start the cut and then proceed with the finer part of it, and do not cease doing this continuously until you reach the point where you can administer the thick and the fine part of all.
Mays en quascuna de las autras fracturas petitas capillars e fractura subtil, cove que administres cura segon aquo que perduseys ad rectificacio de lu.	In any other small fractures or fine fractures, you must administer care according to what you have done for correction of it.
E es causa que no es ameguada sobre totz les quals han studi en aquela art.	And it is because they are not taught about all those who have studied that art.
E stec sobre aquo que nos scriut havem mostrat en grans fracturas.	And place this over what we have written about in great fractures.
E si le pannicol es retangut quan tu erradiques le os, lahoras cove que prenguas drap de li segon la quantitat de la plagua, e submergeys aquel en oli rozat, e pausa aquel sobre le orrifici de la plagua; e aprop pren autre drap doblat o triplicat e submergeys lu en vi e oli rozat e pausa aquel sobre drap prim e fay aquo al pus leugierament que podes sobre aquel, que no graves le ciphac; e aprop administra sobre aquel liament lat, e no strenhas aquel sino per quantitat que tengua la plagua tant solament.	And if the bandage is torn when you are extracting the bone, then take cloth according to the size of the wound, and immerse that in olive oil, and place it over the opening of the wound; then take another piece of folded or triple-folded cloth, immerse it in wine and olive oil, and place it over the first one, doing this lightly enough so as not to weigh down the dressing. And administer salt on top of that, but do not press too hard except according to the size of the wound.
E layssa aquel am aquesta cura per un dia o per dos entro que sias segur de apostema caut; e aprop deslia aquel e aprop aministra medicinas am las quals es superflua siccitat, ayssi cum razitz de lin e farina de errs, e polvera de enses e de aristologia, e de semblantz ad aquels.	Leave it to this treatment for one day or two until you are sure of no abscess forming; then remove that and administer medicines if there is excessive dryness, such as linseed and wheat flour, powder of thyme and arsenic, and similar substances.
E es que tu fassas de aquestas medicinas polvera que sia pulverizada sobre la plagua, ayssi cum son secas; e universalment, administra en aquel tota medicina de proprietat de la qual es que abstergesca e no mordique.	And you make these medicines into a powder to be撒布于伤口之上，如同干燥的粉末；普遍而言，应使用具有洗涤和不刺激作用的所有药物。
E guarda te segon la tua vertut que la plagua en la tua curacio sia neta; e no sia en lu surdicia de enguent ni autra; ni no layssas agreguar virulencia en lu; quar quan es ajustada sobre le pannicol del cervel, corromp aquel e poyreys aquel, e accideys sobre le malaute aprop aquo malicia maligna.	And guard that the wound in your cure be clean; and do not let it become surdy of ointment or other; nor leave to add virulence in it; for when adjusted over the linen of the brain, corrupt that and spoil that, and chance upon the evil aprop that malice malign.
E accideys en le ciphac del cap, cum de lu es mondificat le os e majorment quan es menspresada la cura de lu, e es negror en la superficia de lu; e donc considera lahoras si accideys al malaute les accidentz que havem ditz, sapias que es parnicios ses tot dopte.	And it happens in the scapha of the head, as from it is modified the bone and most especially when the cure of it is neglected, and blackness in the surface of it; and therefore consider when it happens to the evil that the accidents that we have said, know that it is pernicious and totally hopeless.
E si no accideys negror sino de la medicina que es pausada desus, e es en vertut de aquela medicina que fassa aquela negror, lahoras cove que tu prenguas de mel una partida e de oli rozat partidas iii, e am aquels linieys un drap, e aprop pausa aquel sobre le ciphac; e aprop cura aquel am las specias de curacio que conveneys entro que sia sanat.	And if no blackness happens but from the medicine that is applied over it, and is in virtue of that medicine which causes that blackness, then take a part of honey and three parts of rubbed oil, and line those with a cloth, and place it over the scapha; and cure it with the species of cure that you find appropriate until it is healed.
Capitol .iii.	Capitol. iii.
De restauracio del nas quan es trincat.	Of the restoration of the nose when it is broken.
Sapias que no es trencat del nas sino doas partidas ensemps pus sobiranas, o una de aquelas alcunas veguadas, per so quar en lu has dos osses, quar la partida dejos es cartillaginosa, e no es trencada e no accideys a lu sino atricio e tortuositat e sinuitat.	Know that it is not the nose itself that is broken, but two parts together with some additional cartilage above, or one of those few cracks, because in the nose there are two bones. The part you leave intact is cartilaginous and is not broken; therefore, do not damage it but apply friction and soothing.
Mays si es trencada la una de las doas partidas de lu, lahoras cove que tu intrometas le dit petit en le sieu nas, e que engualhas aquela fractura dedintz am le tieu dit indic, e am le dit pous defora, entro que retorne le nas segon la sua figura natural.	But if one of the two parts is broken, then you must introduce the small piece into the nostril, and equalize the fracture inside according to your previous indication, and outside with your thumb, so that the nose returns to its natural shape.
E sia fayt aquo per tu am facilitat, e guarda te que no caja per aquela tua operacio sobre le malaute delor.	And do this as I have facilitated for you, and make sure that the pain in the patient does not worsen due to your operation.
E si la fractura es en la pus sobirana partida del nas, e le dit no perve ad aquela, lahoras cove que sia equat am la extremitat del ray en le qual sia petita grossitut.	And if the fracture is in the upper part of the nose, and you cannot reach it, then you must equalize it at the extremity of the ridge where there is a small swelling.
E si la fractura es en doas partidas, lahoras tu fay le semblant de aquo.	And if the fracture is in two parts, then you make it appear as such.
E coyta te am restauracio de lu en le primier dia de la fractura, si es possible; e sino, lahoras aprop le vii o·l x deves le repaus del apostema caut.	And if the limb has restoration on it in the first day of the fracture, if possible; otherwise, as soon as the seventh or half a month, you should give it rest from the apsema caut.
E aprop entromet en la extremitat del nas una meca de drap de li, si la fractura es en una partida, o metz doas calguas, si la fractura es en doas partidas, e sia en la calgua grossitut de tanta quantitat que umpla le trauc del nas.	And then insert into the extremity of the nose a piece of cloth wick, if the fracture is in one part, or two cloths, if the fracture is in two parts, and let the larger quantity swell to fill the nose.
E diysso alcus dels antics restauradors que las calguas sian enfundudas en boder, e sian permudadas en tot dia, mays no es vist a mi; habantz cove que la meca sia enfunduda en album de huou comfit am polvera de moli; e aprop layssa la qualgua entro que l’os sia fermat e sia endurazida la cartillage.	And thus some of the ancient restorers say that the cloths should be soaked in broth, and changed throughout the day, but I have not seen this; instead, use a cove where the wick is soaked in honey comfit powder; and leave the cloth until the bone is firmly set and the cartilage is hardened.
E alcunas veguadas sia entromes en le nas, en loc de calgua, pena de auca pus que es envolopada de drap de li leon; e sia que ja te la fractura del nas pus vehement e que le malaute no sia prohibit de inspiracio.	And sometimes insert into the nose instead of a cloth, a hot pack wrapped in linen cloth; and do this when the nasal fracture is severe and breathing is not prohibited.
E aquesta causa no es a tu necessaria; e si voles, fay aquo, e si voles, fay calguas.	And this cause is not necessary for you; and if you wish, do this, and if you wish, use cloths.
E si accideys autra veguada apostema caut, emplastra le nas am cerot o am coto enfus en vi agre e oli rozat, o am diaquilon.	And if another abscess occurs, apply a cauterization, plaster the nose with wax or cloth soaked in vinegar and oil, or with a diaphoretic.
Mays si no accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que emplaustres aquel defora am farina de sizami e am polvera de enses cofitz am album de huou; e aprop pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e no lies le nas am alcuna causa.	And if no abscess occurs, when it is necessary to plaster that area externally with sesame seed flour and pine bark powder in honey; then place your hand on the patient's forehead, and do not touch the nose for any reason.
Mays si so trencats les osses del nas am fractura petita o so conminuitz, lahoras cove que scindas sobre aquels, e extraguas aquels am insturmentz que conveno ad aquels; e aprop cos la scissura, e cura aquela am aquo que encarna e consolida, e am emplastres ad aquo convenientz.	And if the nose bones are broken by a small fracture or are comminuted, it is necessary to split those areas, and extract them with instruments suitable for those; then close the incision, and treat that area with what encases and consolidates, and with plasters appropriate for this.
E si accideys plagua dedintz le nas, lahoras cove que cures aquela am calguas e administra canulas de plom entro que sia de tot sanat.	And if a swelling occurs inside the nose, it is necessary to treat that with washes and administer lead pipes internally until it is completely healed.
Capitol .iiii.	Chapter IV.
De restauracio de la mandibula quan es trincada.	On the restoration of the jaw when it is broken.
Quan la mandibula dejos es rompuda e la fractura de lu no es am plagua, reguarda lahoras si la fractura es deforas tant solament, e no es trencada en dos e es curvada a las partidas dedintz, lahoras la sua cognicio es leugiera.	When the jaw is broken and the fracture is not displaced, consider whether the fracture is only superficial, not broken into two pieces and bent inwardly, in which case its perception is light.
E cove donc, si la fractura es en la part dreyta, que tu intrometas le tieu indic senestre en la boca del malaute; e semblantment si la fractura es an la mandibula senestra, lahoras intromet le dit indic de la ma dreyta; e impelleys am aquel la gilbositat de la fractura dedintz am facilitat a las partidas defora, am la tua autra ma de la partida defora del os; am aquel decentment equa aquelam.	And thus, if the fracture is on the right side, you should insert your left index finger into the mouth of the patient; similarly, if the fracture is on the left jaw, then insert your right index finger; and push the softness of the fracture inward with ease to the parts outward, with your other hand on the part outward of the bone; do this properly as much as that.
E si la fractura de la mandibula ja es separada en doas, lahoras cove que administres extensio de doas partz segon rectitut entro que sia possibla la equacio de lu.	And if the fracture of the jaw is already separated into two parts, then you should apply extension to both parts according to rightness so that the alignment of them is possible.
E si accideys conmocio de dentz a disrupcio, lahoras strenh aquelas de las quals speras que romandran am fil de aur o de argent o de ceda; e aprop pausa sobre la mandibula trencada cerot, e aprop pausa sobre lu drap duplicat, e pausa sobre le drap gran stelha decentment fayta, o una pessa de sola engual a la longitut de la mandibula; e aprop lia aquela desus segon que a tu es apparelhada la liadura de lu e que conveneys la applicacio, entro que no es destruida.	And if you notice the loss of teeth along with disruption, then strengthen those from which you expect the roots to be of gold or silver or cedar; and place your hand over the broken jaw, and place another hand on the doubled cloth, and place a large star-shaped stake decently made, or a single piece equal in length to the jaw; and place that above as it suits your bandage and application, so long as it is not destroyed.
E comanda al malaute que use de repaus e tranquilitat, e pausa la vianda de lu sorbicios leons.	And command the patient to take rest and tranquility, and stop his food intake for a while.
E si extimas que ja es alterada la figura en alcuna manieyra, lahoras tu te coyta e deslia aquel al tertz dia; e aprop rectifica aquo que ja es alterat de lu e emplaustra aquel am polvera de moli, am album de huou, o am farina de cisami, pus que tu auras ostat le cerot de lu, e pausa sobre le emplastra lana leon.	And if you think that the figure has already been altered in any way, on the seventh day you incise and remove it; then correct what is already altered in him and plaster the area with powder of molybdenum, or with ocher, or with flour of comfrey, provided that you have bathed his wound, and place a lion's wool bandage over the plaster.
E adonc cum sta annex e ajustat aquel emplastre sobre lu, e la disposicio del os no es alterada, layssa aquel, que no le deslies entro que sia sanat e strenh la fractura; quar motas veguadas aquesta fractura es streyta en tres sempmanas.	And then, once this plaster is properly applied to him, and the position of the bone has not been altered, leave it as it is, without removing it until the fracture is healed and strong; for major fractures take three weeks to heal.
E si autra veguada accida apostema caut, lahoras administra aquo que havem dit motas veguadas en la sedacio de lu entro que sia sanat, e sia remaugut aquel apostema.	And if another time an abscess occurs, then administer what we have said about major fractures in the treatment of it until it is healed and drained.
E si la fractura es am plagua, lahoras considera si es pessa del os separada o satagias, lahoras tu te subtilia que ostes aquelas satagias am aquo que conveneys ad aquo en la remocio de aquelas dels sturmentz.	And if the fracture is comminuted, then consider whether it is a severe bone separation or displacement. Then you should carefully handle those displacements as needed during the removal of the fragments.
E si le orrifici de la plagua es streyt, lahoras tu le amplifique am le fleubotomi segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And if the openings of the wound are narrow, then enlarge them according to the quantity of your necessity using the flebotomy.
E aprop quan tu auras ostat aquelas satagias, e de aquelas no sira remaugut re, lahoras tu cos le orrifici de la plagua si es ampla; e sino, pausa sobre aquela un dels emplaustres que conveneysso ad aquo e encarnan aquela, entro que sia sanada.	And when you have completed those stages, and there is no longer any need to remain at those steps, then use the openings of the wound if they are wide; otherwise, place over it one of the plasters that suit this and cover the area until it heals.
Capitol .v.	Capitol V.
De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.	For the restoration of the furcula when it is broken.
Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquela fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.	When the scapula is broken, you must treat the muscle of the anterior part, and that fracture can occur in one of three ways.
Quar o es trencada, o seperada, o es seperada en doas partz otra que no accidan satagias; e es leugier a la restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que accideysso en lu satagias, e es dificil a restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que la fractura es am plagua.	When it is broken, separated, or completely severed into two parts without requiring stages, the restoration is easier. When such separation occurs with stages, the restoration is more difficult. Or when the fracture involves the wound.
E la operacio en aquela, quan la fractura es ses plagua, es que tu fassas esser present dos ministres, per so que la un tengua le adjutori e siegua la furcula trencada, e l’autre extenda le col ves aquela partida.	And the operation in this case, when the fracture involves the wound, is that you have two ministers present, so that one holds the assistant and guides the broken scapula, and the other extends the neck towards that part.
E aprop enguala la fractura am les tieus ditz entro que sia fayta la forma de lu segon que cove, e no sia en lu eminencia pauca ni concavitat.	And then equalize the fracture by placing it in the groins as it is made to form according to its nature, neither on a too prominent part nor in a concavity.
E si indigeysses mes de extencio, lahoras cove que pauses dejos le titillic del malaute spera de drap o de lana, e sia la grandesa de lu segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat; e exten e eleva la furcula e coarta la spera am la tua ma entro que enguales la frectura segon que cove.	And if you need more extension, then place a fold of the patient's clothing or wool, and let its size be according to your necessity; extend and elevate the fork and press the fold with your hand as you equalize the fracture according to its nature.
E si no podes atirar la extremitat de la furcula a las partidas defora, per so quar es pervenguda al preon, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e pauses sobre le muscle de lu un coyssi migier en grandeza.	And if you cannot stretch the end of the fork to the parts outside, because it is obstructed by the hip, then place the patient on his side with his neck bent, and place a half-cushion over the muscle.
E le ministre prema le muscle de lu a las partidas dejos entro que l’os de la furcula sia elevat que es en le preon en sus, e lahoras tu rectifique la fractura e enguala aquela am les tieus ditz.	And the minister presses the muscle on the sides until the bone of the fork reaches the hip, and then you correct the fracture and equalize it in the groins.
Mays si sentes satagias de la furcula e so maugudas, lahoras cove que fendes sobre aquela e extraguas aquelas satagias am facilitat.	But if you feel the tendons of the fork and they are swollen, then cut over that area and extract those tendons easily.
E si es retenguda en le os, lahoras tu ingenia inscisio de lu am un dels inscissoris les quals has apparelhatz ad aquo, pus que havias pausat dejos la furcula le sturment que serve le ciphac; e es sturment de fust o de ferr del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if it is retained in the bone, then you will make an incision in it with one of the bistouri tools which you have prepared for this, after having placed your hand on the greater trochanter to guide the instrument; and this instrument is either a wooden or iron rod, of which this is the form:
E es semblant a culier del qual aquesta es la concavitat; e sia la sua latitut segon aquo que has necessitat de lu, segon la grandeza del os o la pauqueza de lu.	And it is similar to a spoon, of which this is the cavity; and its width according to that which you have needed from it, according to the size of the bone or its smallness.
Mays la longitut de lu sia segon que es a tu possible a la operacio; que haja doas extremitatz ayssi cum vezes, e la una extremitat sia ample e l’autre streyta.	But the length of it should be according to what is possible for the operation; that it have two extremities thus like a fork, and one extremity broad and the other narrow.
E si la disrupcio de la plagua la qual has inscidida quan has extraytas la satagia del os es ampla, e yest segur de apostema caut, lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura.	And if the disruption of the wound which you have incised when you have extracted the fragment of the bone is wide, and you are certain of a carbuncle forming, then you adjust the two lips of the wound with sutures.
E si la disrupcio es pauca, o temes apostema caut, lahoras tu uemple la plagua am draps e pulvils segon la quantitat de la scissura de la plagua.	And if the disruption is small, or you fear a carbuncle forming, then you manage the wound with cloths and powders according to the quantity of the incision in the wound.
E si accideys apostema caut, lahoras infon drap en vi agre e oli rozat e vi, e pausa sobre aquel.	And if an abscess occurs, then fill a cloth with warm oil and wine, and place it over that area.
Mays la strictura del os quan es ses plagua e ses seccio, es que pauses emplastre fayt de farina de moli am album de huou, e pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e aprop pausa la spera dejos le titillic de lu, si indigeyssas de aquela, e aprop pren humemate, so es torca la qual teno les Sarrazis , que sia mot longua, e sia latitut de lu de un palm o entorn aquel; e aprop pausa pulvils duplicatz sobre la stopa e l’emplastre; e aprop pren una stela de taula subtil de la qual la latitut d’ela sia de tres ditz e en longitut semblantment; e aprop envolopa aquela en drap, e aprop envolopa aquel drap am la stela en lo loc sobre le loc de la fractura; e aprop pausa humemati ayssi cum es revout, e revol aquela sobre le col de lu e dejos le titillic de lu sa e dejos le titillic de lu malaute, e reduzeys aquela sobre tota partida, e quan vezes que la strictura de la fractura am strictura descent, e es aquo que no es occultat sobre tu.	When the bone structure is swollen and painful, you should pause to apply a plaster made of flour mixed with honey, place it over the lion's stop, and then place the splint if needed. If a splint is required, use one that is long enough to cover about a palm's width; then place a double powder over the plaster and the splint. Next, take a thin table stick whose width is about three fingers and length similar to it; wrap this in cloth, and wrap the cloth around the splintered area on the fracture location. Then pause to apply the plaster again, and repeatedly cover it around the splinter's neck, leaving some of the splinter exposed for infection to drain out, and return everything to its proper place, and when the swelling of the fracture subsides, this is what is not hidden from you.
E tot, que no sia mauguda la stelha desobre le os trencat; e per so cove que tu vejas le malaute quascun dia, que quan le liament es mollificat o vezas la stela ja esser remauguda, lahoras tu rectifica aquo e strenh la liadura.	And always ensure that the splint is not too tight on the broken bone; and so cover that you may see the wound daily, for when the dressing becomes moist or you see the splint already loosened, then you adjust this and strengthen the binding.
E aprop pausa le dormir del malaute sobre le col de lu, e pausa dejos le titillic de lu deves le dormir de lu en la nueyt un petit coyssi; per so que am aquel sia elevat le adjutori de lu del latz de aquel, e donc es elevada la la fractura de la furcula a elevacio del muscle; o sia le bras de lu liat al col de aquel.	And then place the patient's head on their pillow, and place a cushion under their neck, to elevate the support of that part during sleep; thus the fracture of the furcula is elevated to the elevation of the muscle; or the arm is laid against the side of that.
E no deslies le liament si no accideys en le loc prusiment o apostema, entro a xii dias.	And do not remove the bandage unless there is an accident or abscess in the place, within twelve days.
E aprop renovelha le emplastre si has vista la facia de lu ad aquo, e ajusta en la strictura e restaura aquel e layssa entro que sia restaurat e sia coagulat la fractura de la furcula.	And then renew the plaster if you see the face of it indicating this, and adjust to the constriction and restore that, and let the fracture of the furcula be restored and coagulated.
E es strenguda e comfortada segon le mes en xxviii dias, e alcunas veguadas en alcus homes es fayt en mens de temps de aquel.	And it is strengthened and made comfortable according to the need in twenty-eight days, and in some cases, it is done in less than that time.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter VI.
De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	On the restoration of the fracture of the shoulder.
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	The spatula tart is broken in the middle of the fracture and not from the fracture itself but from the margins.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	And when the location is broken — and it is broken in the middle of the location — and it is not known otherwise by touch, then according to the figure of the fractured bone, prepare that place and reduce it according to the natural figure in every manner of the technique which is within your ability.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc.	And then place on the area powder of ground alum and stopover; and then place dust of doubled cloth; and then place over the splint on the table a thin strip according to the quantity of the spoon all or a little more.
Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	But if you leave the splint concave in some parts of the spoon's location, then you equalize that concavity with stopover; and then place the splint according to equality.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	And then strengthen above with adhesive ligature long and firm, and firmly place the splint so that it is not displaced from its location.
E considera le liament en quascun dia; e totas veguadas que sia mollificat, lia autra veguada e stren le e equa la stela si es remauguda del sieu loc.	And consider the bandage on any day; and every time it becomes moist, reapply another time and strengthen and equalize the splint if it is displaced from its location.
E jagua le malaute sobre le sieu latz sa.	And place the patient on their side.
E la spatula es restaurada en xx dias o en .xxv.	The spatula is restored in xx days or in .xxv.
E donc quan es complit aquest nombre, lahoras tu dissolveys le liament, e que tu scias ensegurat quar aquela es dels osses dels quals la cominicio no es temuda ni lor dissolucio.	And when this number is completed, then you dissolve the bond, and that you know securely which one is from the bones whose beginning was not feared nor their dissolution.
E si procezeys del loc del os pessa e pongeys dejos la codena, lahoras tu scindeys sobre lu, e osta le, e fay segon que havem dit en la fractura de la furcula de sadacio de apostema caut si accideys aqui. De restauracio de la fractura del pietz.	On the restoration of the fracture of the foot.
Le pietz alcunas veguadas es romput en le mieg loc de lu e aquo tart endeve; mays las extremitatz de lu mot endeve que so ciccadas e comminuidas.	The foot sometimes breaks in the middle of its location; however, its ends continue to be constricted and fragmented.
E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment. And the restoration is that they are laid on their back, and a cushion is placed between their shoulders; then press on their muscles, adjust their spine against the backs of two chairs, and carefully perform the operation and equate everything in every way possible until the figure of the bone returns as it should.

And then place it on the plaster and sponge, and place it over a thin wooden board covered with tulle or cloth similar in lightness, so you wrap that with a cloth; then carefully place it around the broken bone so it is not too tight; and tie it firmly but decently several times along the back. And consider the bandage at all times, and when it becomes softened, strengthen it.
E si necessitat provoca a desliament de aquela deves corrossio o pruziment, o dolor, o apostema que accideysso en le loc, lahoras tu coyta e deslia aquela e erradica le emplastre e rectifique aquo que accideys per aquo am manieyra de curacio de lu; e aprop reduzeys le emplastre, si vezes ad aquo la facia; e ajusta a lu strictura entro que sia sanat.	And if necessity causes an abscess or pus, pain, or boil to develop in that area, then you should incise and drain it, relieve the pain, or treat the boil. De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas.	For the restoration of the ribs when they are fractured.

De restauracio de fractura del spondil del dos e del col.	On the restoration of fractures of the vertebrae of the spine and neck.
Alcunas veguadas endeve fractura als osses del col, e tart endeve a lor atricio, e semblantment als spondils del dos.	In some cases, when fractures occur in the bones of the neck, one should apply traction and friction, similar to that used for vertebrae of the spine.
E cum aquo accideys ad alcu e voles saber si sara sanat o no, lahoras considera, quar si vezes las sieuas mas ja mollificadas e stupefaytas e mortas e no pot maure aquelas ni extendre ni strenher aquelas e quan constrenges aquelas am les tieus ditz o punges aquelas am agulha e no sent en aquelas dolor, lahoras sapias que no es sanat, e en las mes de disposicios es mortal.	And when this happens to someone and you want to know if they will recover or not, then consider whether their pulses are already softened, numbed, and dead and cannot increase nor extend nor strengthen those, and when you press them with your fingers or poke them with a needle and do not feel pain in them, then you know that it is not healing, and in such cases it is fatal.

Mays si no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, la causa es milhor e pus leugiera.	If no other cause occurs, the cause is better and more slight.

And then place one of the comforting and soothing plasters, and cover it with a layer of lint; order the patient to take rest and be tranquil, and not to sleep on the part where he feels pain until he is healed.
E si accideys deves la atricio del os satagias o alcuna causa que ja es seperada de lu, lahoras cove que secces sobre la codena e que ostes aquel os; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua, am sutura si es gran; e aprop cura aquela am alcu encarnatiu dels enguentz, entro que sia sanat.	And if it happens that you need to scrape the bone surface or any cause already separated from it, then make sure to dry the wound and hold that bone; then close the two edges of the wound,缝合如果伤口较大；然后用一些膏药敷在那块肉上，直到它愈合。

De restauracio de la ancha.	For the restoration of health.

De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the adjutrix.
Adjutori es aquo que es entre le coyde entro al cap de la spalla.	Adjutrix is that which is between the codex (or cubitus) and the head of the shoulder.

Capitol .xii.	Capitol. XII.
De restauracio de fractura del bras.	On the restoration of fracture of the arm.
Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus.	The arm is composed of two bones, which are called the ulna and the radius; of which the former is small, and is that which we call the humerus, while the latter is large and is that which rests on top of the smaller one.
E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	And if the major bone is broken alone, or the minor one, and both are fractured together.
E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera.	And when the minor bone is broken above, then the restoration of it is easier, and its recovery is more easy.
E quan es trencat le focil de lu dejos la fractura de lu es mala, e la sanacio de lu es dificil.	And when the fracture of the thigh is broken, I leave the fracture bad, and the healing of it is difficult.
E pus mala de aquela es quan son trencatz dos osses essemps.	And worse when those two bones are broken.

Therefore, if the bone that is broken is the small thigh bone, then it is convenient for the doctor to restore it, which involves a slight extension facilitated by equalizing the parts.
Mays si le focil gran es aquo que es trincat, lahoras cove que pause extencio pus vehement.	But if the large thigh bone is broken, then you must apply more extension.
E si les dos focils so ensemps trincatz, lahoras cove que tu pauses la extritura mot pus fort.	And if both thigh bones are broken together, then you must apply stronger traction.
E cove que pauses la figura de la ma deves la restauracio de lu e la extencio de lu estenduda sobre un coyssi, e sia le pols de la ma a las partidas desus, pus aut que totz les autres ditz, e le dit auricular sia pus bas dels autres ditz, e le malaute sia cezent sobre una cezela cayrada.	And you must place your hand firmly to restore it and extend it over a cushion, while placing the wrist of the hand above, more than the others. E sia un coyssi denant lu en la altetut o endreyt de lu, per so que·l malaute no encorra trebalh.	And place a cushion in front of it at its height or straight, so that the thigh does not have to work.

E aprop le metge engualhe le os entro que redugua aquel segon la milhor figura que pot.	And then the doctor realigns the bone within the joint according to the best form that can be achieved.
E si en la factura del os so satagias, lahoras te perforsa raduzir tota pessa en le sieu loc am la tua vertut.	And if there are complications in the fracture of the bone, then you must thoroughly reduce the entire piece to its place with your virtue.
E si appar en lu satagia separada que punh la codena e no es a tu speransa en la restauracio de lu, lahoras tu fen sobre lu e osta aquela segon la manieyra la qual havem dita desus. Mays si la fractura es am plagua, yeu ja he fayt ad aquo capitol singular, e donc pren la curacio de aquel.	But if the fracture is comminuted, I have dealt with that in a separate chapter, and therefore take up the treatment of it.
E si accideys apostema caut al comensament de la tua restauracio, lahoras tu lineys un drap am cerot fayt de oli rozat e cera blanca, e sia migier entre specitut e subtilitat, e strenh drap sobre aquel am strictura subtil entro que le apostema sia cedat; e lahoras remau le cerot e pausa emplastre preparat de polvera de moli am clayre de huou, e aprop pausa stelhas; e sia la stela la qual es pauzada sobre aquela fractura pus lada e pus fort. E sapias que·l nombre de las stelas del bras so vi en las majors disposicios, o sia la fractura en un focil o en dos focils ensemps.	And you shall know that the number of ribs in the arm I see in the major dispositions, or rather the fracture in one bone or two bones together.

E les draps que so envolopatz sobre la fractura sian draps mols humitz, e no sian durs ni aspres, e·l fiel am le qual es strenhut sia de li propriament migier entre subtil e gros, ayssi cum havem recomtat. And if any cause arises for which correction is necessary, as often happens to the limb, then you must immerse the limb in water until that pain ceases.
E leysses le membre no costreyt entro que repause, e aprop torna la strictura.	And let the limb not be bound until it has rested, and then return the compression.

Capitol .xiv.	Chapter XIV.
De restauracio de fractura del os de la coyssa.	For the restoration of fracture of the iliac bone.
Le os de la cueyssa motas veguadas es trencat e es declarat al sentiment segon que es convertit a la partida denant e a la pus sobirana.	The iliac bone, when fractured, is felt according to where it protrudes forward and where it rises above.

E aprop le ministre extenda tot le liament a la sua partida segon la qualitat, quan la fractura es en le mieg loc del os.	And then the minister extends the ligament to its proper place according to its quality when the fracture is in the middle of the bone.
Mays si es propdana a la razitz de la cueyssa, lahoras sia le liament propda al denolh a la partida del pentenilh, per so que la extencio caja en sus, e le autre liament dejos la fractura. E semblantment si la trencadura es propdana al denolh, lahoras sia fayt le liament propda al denol, e sia la extencio a las partidas dejos.	And similarly, if the fracture is near the hip joint, then place the ligament at the hip, and the extension to the parts below.
E aprop le metge enguale le os am amduas las sieuas mas entro que reduzesca aquel segon la semblansa natural e l’os es conjungit per bona conjunccio; lahoras cove que pauses emplastre e strictura, si no accideys al membre apostema.	And then the doctor aligns the bone by bringing his hands close to where you have reduced it according to the natural form, and the bone is joined by good conjunction; then apply a plaster and bandage, so as not to infect the member with an abscess.
Mays si accideys en lu apostema, lahoras tu layssa aquel per alcus dias entro que l’apostema caut sia cedat, e aprop retorna a la tua curacio.	But if an abscess does occur, then you let it be for a few days until the abscess is ready to be cauterized, and then return to your treatment.
La strictura de lu sia ayssi fayta: cove que envolopes sobre la fractura una benda dura, e dobla aquela dos o tres veguadas, e remaugua de lu superfluitat; e aprop envolopa la camba entro que pervengua al talo e a la razitz de la cueyssa.	The bandage should be done as follows: first, wrap a hard bandage around the fracture, fold it two or three times, and tie off any excess; then wrap the bandage until it reaches the talus and the ligament of the thigh.
E intromet lonc fiel entre la cueyssa e la camba prop del denol a las partidas dejos, e venguan las extremitatz del fiel de la partida pus sobirana de las doas partz, e aprop revolveys sobre la camba e la cueyssa aquo que superflueys de la benda.	And insert a long piece of flax between the thigh and the leg bandage near the wound, so that the ends of the flax extend above both parts, then wrap this over the bandage and thigh with any excess from the bandage.
E aprop pausa sobre la cueyssa en le loc de aquela fractura astelhas, e pausa de aquelas una stela sobre le os de la camba.	And then place something on the thigh at the location of the fracture, and place a stick over the bone of the leg.
E aprop uempli las vacuitatz entre la camba e la cuoyssa am draps mols, per so que sia coagulada la extrictura.	And then fill the void between the waist and thigh with soft cloth, so that the constriction may be constricted.
E aprop comensa am strictura fort del mieg sobre le loc de la fractura am tres envolucios o quatre, e quant mays tu te alonhas am liament del loc de la fractura, la tua strictura sia menor e pus leugiera e pus molha. E aprop exten a doas extremitatz del fiel a las partidas dejos entro que pervengua a la cavilha del pe, e strenh amdoas las extremitatz de las stelhas del autra part per so que·l liament no sia remaugut del sieu loc.	And then extend the two ends of the bandage to the parts where it reaches the foot's cavity, and tighten both ends of the straps on the other side so that the padding does not shift from its place.
E aprop leyssa la strectura sobre aquel, don esta ayssi que no accideys al membre corrosio ni apostema caut ni emflacio e semblantz ad aquels; e si accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, adonc cueta te am desliament de lu, e rectifica aquo que accideys tot aprop, segon que havem dit motas veguadas.	And then place the constriction over it such that it does not interfere with the limb's corrosion, abscess, or inflammation and resembles those conditions; if any of these conditions occur due to some cause, then note it down, and adjust what has occurred as soon as possible, according to what we have said previously.
Mays si en le os es pessa del os la qual pongua, lahoras cove que tu engualhes aquel segon que a tu es possibla; e sino, fen sobre lu e remau aquel, e cura am aquo del qual es precedida la rememoracio entro que sia sanat.	More so if the bone is badly damaged where it should be placed, then make sure you align it as much as possible; otherwise, set it in place and immobilize it, and treat the area from which the memory was recalled until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es strenhuda aquesta fractura de la coyssa otra aquo que sian ajustadas a lu stelhas, ayssi cum havem dit en le adjutori e·n le bras.	Sometimes this fracture of the hip is strengthened by adjusting it with stays, as we have said in the assistant and in the arm.
Mays empero en la restauracio de lu en tal manieyra fayta no accideys al malaute claudicacio; e si es restaurada sola, otra aquo que li sia applicada l’autra camba, lahoras es necessari que claudique aquel del qual es tostemps. De restauracio de la fractura de la camba.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the flank.
Sapias que en la camba so dos osses dels quals la un es gros, e es le nompnat per nom de la camba; e l’autra es subtil, e es nompnat focil.	Know that in the flank there are two bones, of which one is large and is named after the flank itself; the other is thin and is named false.

Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De la fractura del talo e dels osses del pe e dels ditz.	Of the fracture of the tarsus and the bones of the foot and toes.
Al talo no accideys fractura de tot; mays als osses del pe accideys fractura alcunas veguadas; e als ditz del pe pauc accideys fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio en las mes de disposicio. De fractura del conh de la femna e del os del pentenilh e de la vergua del home.	Of the fracture of the thigh bone and the patella bone and the groin of the man.
Quan le conh de la femna es trincat, lahoras fay aquela ceser en cezela cayrada, e aprop enclina aquela a la partida del dos un petit, e sia tenguda detras. And then the midwife fills the bone with cement, and it is done in the thigh as desired; then the woman is anesthetized, and her leg is gradually elevated little by little, for all of this must be done before the part of the thigh as desired so that the fractured bone returns.
E aprop pausa pulvils sobre le dos de lu, e quan vol urinar remaugua le coto am facilitat e aprop urine, e reduzeys e retorna aquel segon la manieyra segon la qual mezist aquel al comensament, e aprop retorne al sieu pulvil primier.	And then place powders on the leg, and when she wants to urinate, moisten the cement to facilitate it; then let her urinate, return to that position according to the method in which you placed it at the beginning, and then return to her original powder.
E fassa ayssi per vii dias o enviro aquels, quar aquel es restaurat.	And do so for seven days or until it is restored.
E si voles, pren una vezica de ovela e strenh sobre le trauc de lu una canula de canavera; e entromet tota la vesica en le conh de lu, e aprop ensuffla en la canula am vertut entro que la vesica sia imflada dedintz le conh, quar la fractura retorna.	And if you wish, take a sheep's bladder and tightly sew over the wound a cannula of reed; then insert the entire bladder into the wound, and soon blow into the cannula to impart virtue within that the bladder be inflated inside the wound, for the fracture returns.
E aprop sia umplida de coto e estia per alcus dias segon que havem recomtat, entro que sia sanat.	And it should be filled with pus and left for some days as we have recommended, until it is healed.
E quan le os del pentenil de home o de femna es trincat, lahoras aministra en la restauracio e agulacio de lu aquo que havem recomtat en l’os del anca.	And when the bone of the thigh of a man or a woman is broken, then administer in the restoration and needle treatment of it what we have recommended for the bone of the hip.
E aquo que es dreyt no es occultat en aquestas fracturas proprinquas e que pauc endeveno, majorment ad aquel al qual es alcun studi e us e enten aquest meu libre mot; quar aquela fractura significa a tu en las majors disposicios via dreyturiera en la restauracio e en la strictura de lu, e donc enten be.	And what is right is not hidden in these nearby fractures and those that rarely occur, especially to him who has some study and use and understands this my free will; for that fracture means to you in the major disposals via rightful in the restoration and in the stricture of it, and therefore understand well.
Mays en la vergua del home quan es trincada, pren guarguamela de auca, e met la vergua en aquela; e aprop pausa sobre lu envolucio de drap, e sia envolopada, e aprop sia layssada per tres dias o enviro aquels, e sia sanada.	In the case of the thigh of a man when it is broken, protect it from infection, and insert the thigh into it; then place it over the wrapping of cloth, and let it be wrapped, and let it be left for three days or about that time, and may it be healed.
Capitol .xix.	Chapter XV.
De restauracio de fractura dels osses quan es am plagua.	For the restoration of bone fractures when they are dislocated.
Convenient es ad aquel al qual accideys fractura am plagua, e majorment si le os es gran ayssi cum es le os de la cuoyssa o de l’adjutori, o semblant ad aquel, que tu te cuoytes e fleubotomes aquel tantost si las condicios de fleubotomia a tu o testifican ayssi cum desus havem dit.	It is convenient to treat those upon whom a fracture dislocation occurs, especially if the bone is large, such as the thigh bone or the shoulder blade, or similar. You should set and bleed that part frequently, provided that the conditions for bloodletting are as we have said above.
E si la plagua eflueys sanc, lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la retencio de lu enayssi que tu polverizes sobre lu zegi trissat, si a tu autra causa no es present.	And if the dislocation flows pus, then you should set it with retention, attempting to sprinkle over it zinc trisulfate, unless another cause is present.
E aprop comensa restaurar la fractura en aquel meteys dia, e no prolongues aquo, si no accideys apostema.	And soon begin to restore the fracture on that same day, and do not delay this, if an abscess does not occur.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la restauracio de lu entro al ix dia, entro que sia cedat le apostema, e no apropinques a lu en le tertz dia e·l iiii de tot, quar tu faras accidir mals accidentz.	But if an abscess does occur, then you should delay the restoration until the sixth day, once the abscess is lanced, and not approach it on the seventh or eighth day, for then you will bring about worse accidents.
Mays si le os trencat es eminent sobre la codena descubert, lahoras cove que te perforses reduzir aquel e engualar aquel am las tuas mas am facilitat e am pauca extencio.	If the bone is broken and protrudes outside the joint, then you must puncture to reduce it and equalize it with your hands with as much ease and little extension as possible.
Mays si extencio no es a tu preparada e la equacio de lu am las tieuas mas, lahoras tu reduzeys aquel am las tuas mas am aquest sturment; e es sturment le qual es fayt de ferr, la longitut del qual es de vii ditz o de viii e la latitut del qual es segon la quantitat de la plagua; e per aquo es necessari al metge que prengua de aquels tres o quatre segon la quantitat que indigeys ad aquo en la curacio en tota specia de fractura.	If the extension is not easily reducible with your hands, then you must reduce it with this instrument; and this instrument is made of iron, its length being about seven or eight inches and its width according to the size of the wound; and for this, the doctor must take one or two of these according to the quantity needed in the treatment for all types of fracture.
E sia redon, e sia en lu pauca groceza per so que no sia doblat deves la comprecio sobre aquel en la hora de la operacio.	And it should be round, and of small thickness so that it does not bend during the operation.
E sia de aguda extremitat al qual sia marge en las sieuas extremitatz; e sia le desus de lu a grossetut tendent, e de la maytat de lu entro a las partidas.	And it should have sharp ends, with edges at the outer ends; and be thicker at the top, thinner in the middle.
E aquesta es la forma de lu:	And this is the form of it:
E es nompnat en grec “labre volentz atelarem”, so es paleta pauca.	And it is named in Greek as "labre volentz atelarem," so it is a small palette.
Per que cove que sia pausada la extremitat de lu acuda elevada sobre la extremitat del os eminent.	In order that the extremity of the limb may be raised above the end of the prominent bone.
E inpelleys aquel en una veguada entro que retorne le os, e sia engualat am alcuna equacio.	And push it in quickly so that the bone returns and is aligned with some equation.
E donc esforsa te engualar las extremitatz de la fractura entre lor, e si la extremitat de lu trencada es subtil, e no pren aquela le sturment per bona axcepcio, lahoras cove que tu inscidas la extremitat de aquel os entro que l’insturment haja poder de aquo.	And strive to align the extremities of the fracture with each other. If the broken extremity is slender and does not take hold with the instrument for a good reason, then you must insert the extremity of that bone where the instrument has the power to do so.
Mays si no podes reduzir le os de tot am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras enscideys aquel am aquo que coveneys a lu dels inscizoris les quals havem ditz; o serra aquel am una de las serras en qualque manieyra sia a tu possible.	But if you cannot reduce the bone in this manner, then incise that part as seems fit to you among the incisors we have mentioned; it may be one of the bones in any manner it is possible for you.
E aprop ratz aquel que roman en le os de asperitat e de scorsas menudas.	And quickly remove that which remains in the bone of roughness and small fragments.
E cum le os es reduzit, e aprop la reduccio le malaute atroba dolor vehement ledent, lahoras sapias que le os no es retornat al sieu loc natural; e adonc fay aquo quar tu confereyses al malaute gran juvament.	And when the bone is reduced, and after reduction, if the patient finds great pain in the limb, then you should know that the bone has not returned to its natural place; then do what you will find greatly beneficial for the patient.
Cum es complida la tua restauracio la qual fas al os, e lahoras submergeys drap en vi stiptic negre, e propriament si es en estiu, e no pauses sobre la plagua cerot ni autre causa en la qual sia oli, per so que no fassa en lu accidir poyredura e corropcio.	When your restoration of the mouth is completed, and then submerge a cloth in vitriolic vinegar tightly bound black, and properly in summer, and do not pause over the wound to cauterize or any other cause which might be oil, so that no accident of burning or corruption happens.
E aprop aministra stelas en la hora del tieu compliment de la restauracio de l’os, e layssa la plagua descuberta enayssi que inscidas le trauc am forfexs e uses de envolucios segon la quantitat de la plagua.	And then administer steams at the hour of the full moon following the restoration of the bone, and leave the wound uncovered to see if it heals with scissors and use coverings according to the size of the wound.
E guarda te am tota cautela que no strenhas la plagua am la fractura, quar motas veguadas an fayt aquo les fols metges, e fero accidir sobre les sieus malautes mort o malautia corrodent o zuthement, so es sania.	And take great care that you do not strain the wound with the fracture, for many times doctors have caused harm to their patients, leading to death or a severe, corrosive illness, which is unhealthful.
E si la tieua strictura leugiera, molli, diversa de la strictura de las autras fracturas.	And if the lunar eclipse is slight, moist, different from the strictures of other fractures.
E si la plagua es gran o es plagua mala, e temes sobre aquel alcus accidentz mals les quals havem recomtatz, e atrobas dolor en le loc, lahoras no cove que pauses sobre aquel astelas, mays fay ad aquel envolucio de draps durs en loc de stelas e strenh lu am aquelas.	And if the wound is large or a bad wound, and you fear certain adverse accidents which we have mentioned, and you find pain in the area, then do not pause over applying steams, but rather use hard cloth coverings instead of steams and strain it with those.
E cum aprop un dia o dos vezes ja la plagua comensar, que en lu sia engendrat brac, lahoras tu osta desus le drap le qual havias pausat sobre aquel am vi, e aprop aministra calguas, enguentz am les quals de nostra constuma es que mediquem las plaguas, ayssi cum enguentz tetrafarmacon e semblantz ad aquel.	And when after one or two days the plague begins to appear, with a braza (a measure of length), then you lift the cloth which you had placed over that arm, and then administer calxes, ointments which according to our custom we use to treat plagues, thus with tetrafarmacon and similar.
E conveneys a tu que deslias le liament e considera la plagua en quascun dia mati e vespre entro que sia consolidada e fermada, e cove que·l membre sia preparat en tal manieyra que la poyredura corra de lu a las partidas dejos am facilitat.	And you should remove the bandage and observe the plague at each day in the morning and evening until it is consolidated and closed, and ensure that the member is prepared in such a manner that the suppuration flows from it to the parts left open.
si a la plagua passan motz dias, e no es consolidada ni es abscindit de lu le brac, lahoras sapias que aqui so satagias de las petitas per que cove enquieras la plagua am tenta.	If the plague persists for many days and is not consolidated or separated from the arm, then you should know that here you are dealing with serious cases, so carefully examine the plague by touch.
E de aquelas satagias aquelas que so separadas remau e extratz, aquelas que de lor no so separadas e pongen le membre e fan accidir dolor, perforsa te a inscidir aquelas segon que a tu aquo es possibla.	And of those serious cases that are separated and extracted, and those from which the member does not separate and causes pain, forcefully incise them according to what is possible for you.
E si accideys a la plagua zuchem o eluchen, so es stiomenios, o autra specia de corrupcio e de putrefaccio, lahoras cove que pauses a quada un de aquels am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio del qual es precedida narracio en le sieu capitol.	And if you find pus or corruption in the plague, it is stiomenia or some other form of decay and putrefaction. Then you should know that this requires treatment, for which there is a preceding narrative described in its own chapter.
E de aquo en le qual cove que stia lo mieu sermo e tu fassas present la tua pessa: quan os gros es trincat, emineys sobre le membre ayssi cum le os de la coyssa e del ajutori e semblantz ad aquels dels membres grans, e que no presumas atraccio de lu, ni la extraccio de lu quar motas veguadas accideys per aquo la mort; habantz layssa aquel entro que poyresca, quar fort leu cayra per si aprop xx dias o xxx; e lahoras cura la plagua si a tu es vist, e si no layssa aquela.	And in that which hole the lesser worm is located and you make present your hand: when the large bone is broken, you will lie over the limb thus as the bone of the thigh and of the helper and resemble those of the great limbs, and do not presume its traction nor the extraction of it because certain motas may happen by this to the death; having left that which can rot, for strong it will fall by itself in about 20 days or 30; and then cure the wound if you see it, and if not leave that.
Capitol .xx.	Capitol.xx.
De la curacio de nodacio que accideys en le vestigi de alcuna fractura.	For the cure of nodation that occurs in the vicinity of any fracture.
Motas veguadas accideys aquesta nodacio en le vestigi de sanacio de fractura, e majorment que es prop de las juncturas, e es orrasada per lu la figura del membre; e fort leu prohibeys le membre de la sua operacio natural.	Motas visible occur in this nodation near the site of fracture healing, especially close to the joints, and alter the appearance of the limb; therefore, you strongly prohibit the limb from its natural movement.
Adonc considera si la nodacio es recent e aministra en aquela medicinas que han stipticat ayssi co es aloen, e enses, e mira, e sercacollo, e acrassia, e semblantz ad aquels; enayssi que prenguas de aquela alcunas o totas, e comfesiys aquelas am vi stiptic, o am album de huou, o am vi agre, e pausa aquela sobre la nodacio en estopa, e constringeys aquelas sobre lu per bona constriccio.	Then consider if the nodation is recent and administer those medicines that have astringent properties, such as aloes, enses, mira, cercacollo, acrassia, and resemble those; try to take some or all of them, confirm that they are either bitter astringents or bitter of hooey, or bitter agreeable, place one of these on the nodation in lint, and constrict them over it with good constriction.
E leyssa extrictura que no deslies aquela per motz dias; e aprop deslia aquela e itera autra, entro que sia remauguda la nodacio; o strenh sobre aquela lamina de plom descentment, quar plom ha proprietat de remaure tot aquo que es imflat en les membres.	Leave the compression bandage on for several days; then remove it and put on another, while the knot is being loosened; or strengthen the lead sheet hanging down, as lead has the property of tightening whatever is swollen in the limbs.
Mays si nodacio ja es en peyra convertida e streyta es e nessessitat provoca a ostar aquela coytadament, e lahoras scindeys aquela per la partida pus sobirana de lu, e inscideys la superfluitat e eminent, o ratz aquela am alcus rezoris entro que sia remauguda; e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	But if the knot has already turned into a sore and strengthened, and necessity requires to completely open it, then split it along its upper part, and incise the superfluous and prominent part, or cut that away with forceps while it is being loosened; and treat the area until it heals.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De restauracio de fractura quan es restaurada e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul no segon la sieua natura.	For the restoration of fractures when restored and then, approximately, the limb returns to its natural state.
Quan fractura de os es restaurada, e aprop aquo roman le membre subtil e freul, lahoras aquo no es fayt sino per motas causas: de las quals la una es multitut de solucio del liament e de la liguacio de lu fayta no segon que cove; o per superfluitat de strictura dels liamentz entro que·l nutriment sia prohibit correr al membre; o per multitut de embrocaccio superflua; o per movement superfluent no en la sua hora; o per pauquesa de sanc en le cors del malaute e per debelitat de lu.	When a bone fracture is restored, and then the limb returns to its natural state, this is not done for many reasons: one reason is the abundance of solution of the ligament and the joining of it is not done according to what is proper; or due to excess compression of the ligaments while nutrition is prohibited from flowing to the limb; or due to excess ointment application; or due to excessive movement at an improper time; or due to insufficient strength in the body of the patient and its weakness.
E curacio de aquo es dar a mengar al malaute e far le cor de lu tendre entro que·l sanc sia multiplicat en lu; e aministra banh; e entromet gaug e leticia sobre lu.	And the treatment for this is to give the patient something to eat and make the body of the patient weak until the pain increases in the patient; administer baths; and insert cautery and joy into him.
E aprop pausa pegua sobre le membre, per so que la pegua atire a lu mot nutriment, o continua embrocacio de lu am aygua tebeza, entro que·l nutriment corr e retorne a la sua figura natural.	And then place your hand over the limb, so that the hand draws in nourishment, or continue the wet compress with bitter water, until the nourishment flows and returns to its natural form.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De curacio dels osses trincatz quan so restauratz tortuozament e prohibeys la operacio de lor de aquo que cove.	For the treatment of broken bones when they are reduced tortuously and prohibit the operation from which this results.
Quan accideys al membre ja restaurat aprop la sanacio de lu de tortuositat e eminencia al os trincat e nodacio, e es per aquo fededa de forma del membre, mays empero le membre no es prohibit de la sieua operacio natural, lahora no cove que tu recipias la paraula de aquel que exsistima aquel membre sia de novel trincat.	When the limb, already reduced, is nearing recovery from tortuosity and prominence of the broken bone and healing, and this is due to the shape of the limb itself, nonetheless the limb is not prohibited from its natural operation, so you do not need to receive the opinion of someone who believes that part of the limb is newly broken.
Mays ja so statz motz fols metges e restauradors les quals han fayt aquo en nostra tera; e aquesta operacio es mot vituperable perduzent a gran temor le senhal de la qual es mortal.	Nevertheless, there are many skilled surgeons and restorers who have done this in our land; this operation is greatly reproachable as it leads to great fear from the sign of which is fatal.
Mays si claudicacio e nodacio son recentz, lahoras cove que sian enbrocatz am aygua tebeza en la qual so coytas erbas mollificantz, ayssi cum son fuelas de altea e razitz de lu, e mellilot, e semblantz ad aquels; e sia fayt a lu emplastre am emplastre mollificatio ayssi cum dyallaquilon ben fayt; o que sia preza mucillage de razit de altea e sia contucida am gray de gualina o am oli de cirami, e sia emplastrat am aquel; o que sian prezes figuas grassas e sian trissadas am fems de colom, e semblantz ad aquels de las medicinas que son nompnadas amermans consolidacio.	If claudication and nodulation are recent, then soak them in water of a color similar to that of bile in which are infused soft herbs, such as those of hyssop, centaury, and melilot, resembling those; and let it be made into a poultice with a poultice of softening, like well-prepared duckweed; or what is pressed from the juice of centaury and is wrapped in gray of flax or oil of cinnamon, and applied with that; or what are pressed figs and are steeped in goose feathers, resembling those of the medicines named as amber consolidations.
E alcunas vetz es dissolvuda am assidua fricacio leugiera que sia am las mas humidas, e sia administrat movement del membre a tota partida en totas horas.	And sometimes it is dissolved by frequent light friction applied to the more humid areas, and movement of the limb should be administered at all times in all hours.
Mays si tortuositat ja es anada denant e es fayta fort e convertida es en peyra e provocada es necessitat a curacio de lu am ferr, lahoras cove que sia le pus desus cecsat e la continuacio del os sia dissolvut, e sia inscidit aquo que superflueys de nodacio de aquel meteys am le os am inscissoris subtils, e sia aministrada facilitat en aquel am sollicitut e studi.	And if tortuosity has already gone before and is made strong, turning into a stone and necessitating its cure by knife, then it must be that the pus above the cecum is removed and the continuity of the bone is dissolved and incised. What is superfluous from the nodulation of that method should be administered on the bone with fine incisors, and facilitated in that with solicitude and study.
Capitol .xxiii.	Chapter XXIII.
De sermo en dislocacio.	Of speech on dislocation.
Dislocacio es eyssiment de alcuna de las juncturas del sieu loc, per que es prohibida de movement, e es orrezada la figura del membre, e fa venir sobre le malaute dolors e lesios grans.	Dislocation is the displacement of one of the joints of that location, rendering movement prohibited and distorting the figure of the limb, causing great pain and injuries to the patient.
Donc quan accideys ad alcu dislocacio, lahoras cove tantost perforsar que sia reduzit, e no tarde aquela reduzir, quar si es tardada, le loc es apostemat e fort leu am aquo es fayta dificil la reduccio de dislocaccio.	Therefore, when a dislocation occurs, it is important to immediately attempt to reduce it, and not delay the reduction process. If delayed, the area can become infected, making the reduction of the dislocation much more difficult.
E per aysso no cove que sia maugut ni stendut en la hora de la apostemacio, quar motas veguadas fa venir spasme e dolors ledentz.	And for this reason, it should not be cut or stretched during the time of infection, as severe spasms and intense pains can occur.
Mays quan aquo accideys, lahoras cove que tu te coytes a la flaubotomia del malaute, e aprop sia layssat entro que repause le apostema; e aprop le membre sia embrocat am aygua cauda e oli, e aprop sia reduzit am facilitat.	More specifically, when this occurs, you should prepare for an incision in the foot to drain the infection, and allow it to rest until the abscess has subsided; then, apply warm water compresses and oil to the limb, and attempt to reduce the dislocation with ease.
E tot membre sia curat am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra en son loc.	And each member be treated with the water of which the memory will come to its place.
E yeu ja e ordenatz les capitols de dislocacio segon que es precedit en fractura; de la partida del cos pus sobirana entro a la partida pus dejos.	And I have already and ordered the chapters of dislocation according to what is preceded in fracture; from the part of the body first up to the part next, then leave.
Capitol .xxiiii.	Chapter 24.
De curacio de dislocacio de la mandibula dejos.	For the treatment of dislocation of the jaw, proceed.
So dislocadas las doas mandibulas si no tart; e la dislocacio de amdos es fayta segon una de dos manieyras: que o son remaugudas de lurs locs per pauca remocio, e so mollificadas un petit; o so dislocadas per entiera dislocacio e complida, entro que sian mollificadas a la partida de la junctura entro que corro saliva del malaute e que no puesca tenir aquela ni puesca claure la sua boca, e la lengua de lu sia envolopada en sa paraula.	When both jaws are dislocated without a tooth; and the dislocation of both is caused according to one of two methods: either they are slightly moved from their places and made somewhat softer; or they are completely dislocated, and at the part where the jaw meets, saliva flows from the patient's mouth, so that neither can have it nor close its mouth, and the tongue of the patient is wrapped in a cloth.
Mays quan la dislocacio de lu es pauca, lahoras en las majors disposicios retorna per si an pauca causa.	More often than not, when the dislocation is slight, it returns to its place by itself with little cause.
Mays si la dislocacio es entiera e complida, lahoras cove que sia administrada reduccio de lu leugierament, e no sia tardada de tot.	More often than not, when the dislocation is complete and full, it must be reduced gently, and should not be delayed entirely.
E es que·l ministre tengua le cap del malaute, e entrometa lo metge le dit pous de la una sieua ma en la razit de la dislocacio de la mandibula dedintz la boca de lu, si la dislocacio es de la una part; o que entrometa les sieus dos pouzes ensemps, si la dislocacio es de doas partz, e les autres ditz de las mas de lu sian defora am les quals enguale; e comanda al malaute que cesse las suas mandibulas e absolva aquelas anar de quascuna partida; e le metge engualhe la mandibula e enpellisca la mandibula entro que retorne al sieu loc.	And the minister hold the patient's head, and the doctor insert his thumb from one hand into the corner of the dislocated jaw inside the mouth, if the dislocation is on one side; or he inserts both thumbs together if the dislocation is on both sides, and the other fingers of his hands remain outside and equalize; and command the patient to cease moving his jaw and allow those to return from any part; and the doctor equalize the jaw and push it back into its place.
E si dificil es la reducio de lu, e majorment si amdos las mandibulas so essemps dislocadas, lahoras aministra evoporacio am aygua cauda e oli, entro que sia fayta leugiera la reduccio de amdos e no tardes la reduccio de amdos de tot, ayssi quo havem dit.	And if the reduction is difficult, especially if both jaws are completely dislocated, then administer evaporation with hot water and oil, while performing a light reduction of both and do not delay the reduction of both entirely, as we have said before.
E donc cum retornam e so engualadas, e es clausa la boca del malaute e no es mollificada, lahoras pausa sobre aquelas polvils de drap am cerot, e sia fayt de cera e oli rozat; e aprop sia liat am facilitat am liamens mols.	And when returned and equalized, and the mouth of the patient is closed and not softened, then place it on powders of cloth with cerate, made of wax and rubbed oil; and apply it with several soft cloths.
E sia le dormir del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e·l cap de lu sia stant entre dos aurelhes, per so que no maugue aquel a la partida dreyta ni a la sinistra; e no li fassas per forsa masteguar alcuna causa; habans la sieua vianda sia forbicio leon, entro que quan las dolors sian remaugudas e las mandibulas so nozadas, lahoras maugue aquo que vol.	And let the patient sleep on their back, with their head standing between two pillows, so that it does not get wet on either side; do not force them to gargle for any reason; having their food ready by a lion skin, when the pains subside and their jaws are moistened, then wet what they want.
E aquo sia aministrat am facilita, e no trebalhe sobre la apercio de la boca deves la comestio e beure e ocitatio, entro que la mandibula sia nozada e sanada.	And this should be given easily, and you must not work on the aperture of the mouth; let them eat, drink, and breathe freely, when their jaw is healed.
E si es dificil la reduccio de duas mandibulas quan so dislocadas en alcuna hora e no so convertidas als lors locs, lahoras motas veguadas accideysso febres e soda assidua, e fort leu es alerguat le ventre del malaute, e fort leu e vomeys colera pura.	And if the reduction of two jaws when dislocated at any time and cannot be returned to their proper places, then blisters often occur, causing frequent fever and a constant dryness. The belly of the patient is also strongly swollen, with severe vomiting of pure bile.
E quan tu vezes aquo, lahoras sapias que es perdicio; e motas veguadas mor aquel al qual accideys aquo en x dias.	And when you see this, then know it is fatal; and blisters often occur to those upon whom this happens in a few days.
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter XXV.
De reduccio de la dislocacio de la furcula e de la extremitat del muscle.	Of reducing the dislocation of the furcula and the extremity of the muscle.
Furcula no es dislocada del latz dedintz per la sua continuacio am le pietz; e alcunas veguadas es dislocada a la partida defora, e aquo es declarat al sentiment.	The furcula is not dislocated from the leg inside by its continuation to the foot; and sometimes it is dislocated at the outer part, and this is declared by the sensation.
E la restauracio de lu es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos e extenda les sieus brasses.	And the restoration of it is that the patient lies on his back and extends his legs.
E aprop coarta le loc am la tua palma am fort coartacio, quar ela retornara.	And then apply your palm to the area with strong pressure, for it will return.
E aprop pausa sobre aquela emplastre e pulvils e strenh aquela.	And then place your hand over the area with the plaster and powder, and strengthen that.
Mays la extremitat de aquel que siec le coyde e·s continuat am aquel, no es dislocada en alcun dia; lahoras cove que sia reduzida e engualhada segon que havem dit e segon que es a tu aparelhat.	More so, the extremity of that which is connected to the coccyx does not get dislocated in any day; therefore, it should be reduced and equalized as we have said and according to what you have at hand.
E aprop pausa sobre aquela emplastre, e pulvils, e extrictura, e comanda al malaute adherir a trenquilitat e a repaus entro que sia sanat.	And then place your hand over the area with the plaster, powder, and extract, and command the patient to adhere to tranquility and rest until it is healed.
E am aquesta meteyssa curacio es reduzida la extremita del muscle quan es separada del sieu loc.	And in this cure, the extremity of the muscle is reduced when it is separated from its place.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter XXVI.
De la reduccio de la dislocacio del muscle.	On the reduction of the dislocation of the muscle.
Sapias que·l muscle no es dislocat sino segon tres manieras, de las quals es la una que sia dislocat a la partida del titillic a la partida dejos.	Know that the muscle is not dislocated in any manner other than three ways, of which one is when it is dislocated from the tendon to the bone.
E la segonda es que sia dislocat a la partida desus del muscle, e aquo es fayt tart; e no es dislocat a las partidas detras per la spalla; e no es dislocat a las partidas denant per les nervis.	And the second is when it is dislocated above the muscle, which is called tart; and it is not dislocated at the back parts by the shoulder; and it is not dislocated at the front parts by the nerves.
E majorment es dislocat e defora eyssit a las partidas dejos deves le titillic, e majorment en aquels dels quals las carns son paucas, leugierament es dislocat; mays en aquels en les quals so motas carns, es eyssit fora am dificultat.	And it is mostly dislocated outward at the lower parts of the tendon, especially in those where the muscles are few, it is easily dislocated; more so in those where there are many muscles, it occurs with difficulty.
E fort leu accideys ad alcus homes percussio o cazement, e le muscle de lu es apostemat de apostema caut, e es cujat per aquo que ja sia dislocat.	And often such persons suffer from a blow or strike, and the muscle of the person develops an abscess due to a boil, and becomes inflamed because it is already dislocated.
Adonc cove que tu sproes aquo entro que estias sobre-sertetut de lu, e lahoras procesiscas en la curacio de lu.	Then cover what you are especially over them with, and then proceed in the cure of them.
E es conoguda la dislocacio de lu quan es a las partidas dejos deves le titillic; per so que distingescas entre le muscle dislocat e·l muscle sa, quar tu atrobas entre aquels diversitat manifesta; e atrobas en le cap del muscle concavitat e dejos le titillic deves le tocament del cap del muscle ayssi quo un huou, e al malaute no pot redusir la sua ma a la sieua aurelha, ni maure aquela per totz movementz.	And the dislocation is known when it is in the parts; then you must palpate; so that you distinguish between the displaced muscle and the proper muscle, for which you find a clear difference; and you find a concavity at the head of the muscle. When you palpate the head of the muscle, it feels like a hollow space, and the patient cannot bring his hand to his ear, nor can he move it with all movements.
Si es dislocat deves le pietz o ensus, e tu lahoras atrobas manifest tocament, e no es amaguat.	If it is dislocated, you must palpate the foot or upwards, and then you will find a clear touch, and it is not hidden.
